entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 10:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.6°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with snow early this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight then northeast 20 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to snow or ice pellets near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight then light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
